name: Add and delete UFW firewall rules
description: Add and delete a rule on the Uncomplicated Firewall (UFW) if installed and enabled.

data.command:
ufw prepend deny from 1.2.3.4
ufw status numbered

{ echo y; echo response; } | ufw delete 1
ufw status numbered

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Check if ufw is installed on the machine and enabled.

data.command:
if [ ! -x "$(command -v ufw)" ]; then echo -e "
***** ufw NOT installed *****
"; exit 1; fi
if echo "$(ufw status)" |grep -q "inactive"; then echo -e "
***** ufw inactive *****
"; exit 1; fi
